name: Pushing U
description:
A puzzle game about the letter U.

Controls:

arrows, WASD - Move
Z - Undo
R - Restart
Esc - Menu
space, X - Select (only in menu)
M - Mute

This game was made using Pancelor's level select fork for PuzzleScript.

Source code: https://pancelor.com/PuzzleScript/editor.html?hack=99fe649bf5bdd5f5cda2f3453003f...
